tourName: Three-Week Immersive Tour of Thailand for Seniors
placesVisited: Chiang Mai, Chiang Rai, Bangkok, Ayutthaya, Kanchanaburi, Koh Samui, Phuket, Similan Islands
generalInfo: Thailand’s dramatic heritage and enchanting cultural landmarks are wonderfully explored on this handcrafted tour to the country’s most beloved destinations. Over the course of three captivating weeks, you will discover the magic behind Thailand’s renowned cuisine and capture images of remarkable temples. Furthermore, you will share marvelous moments on the pristine, white-sand shores, which draw millions of travelers to the country every year. What makes this tour entirely unique is that we have tailored each experience to take you away from the beaten path and into locations less traveled. Enjoy secluded luxury on this riveting tour of Thai authenticity.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – Wonderful Wilderness of Northern Thailand
dayInfo.description: The breathtaking Northern capital of Thailand, Chiang Mai, boasts a collection of exquisite resorts that are set amid magnificent mountain ranges and cascading green landscapes. You will witness these marvelous sights as you approach Chiang Mai International Airport. Shortly after you have arrived, your private transfer will whisk you away towards your premier accommodation in the heart of the city. A 5-star private suite with panoramic views of the unspoiled wilderness will welcome you to Thailand. Check-in and unwind as you revel in the world-class amenities and award-winning restaurant before soaking up the sunset splendor as you sip on divine cocktails and encounter magical vistas on your first evening in the Land of Smiles. The following day of your adventure will reveal the concealed beauty of Chiang Mai’s hideaway destinations. You can escape the tourist rush of the city’s main cultural attractions and transfer to awe-inspiring locations that are off the beaten path. A guided tour of a local artist village will highlight intricate Thai designs and masterful pieces of work. You can stroll through the traditional streets and catch wafts of authentic cuisine as it is being prepared before visiting exhibitions by coveted artists to capture unique images of the charming architectural sites. Your tour will culminate at a beloved temple, or Wat , for an immersive experience of Thai spirituality. Immaculate Buddha statues are dotted around the temple complex, and a pristine green garden encompasses the grounds. In the evening, you will witness iconic views from the top of Doi Suthep Mountain, and you will climb the mountain from the comfort of a cable car, where you will be welcomed by a 360-degree vista of Northern Thailand. You can capture these idyllic moments and explore the famous Wat Phra That temple that sits atop the mountain. Today, you will discover the marvelous creatures that call Chiang Mai home on your final full day in the city. You will set off for an enchanting morning among the luscious forest, where you will tuck into delightful gourmet delicacies amid the evergreen foliage that encircles the classy establishment. The sumptuous setting will be a breath of fresh air and will mark the beginning of your alluring expedition. You will encounter mighty elephants at an ethical sanctuary that is surrounded by the unspoiled environment. The exemplary staff will share insightful information about the animals and their efforts to protect the environment, and you will enjoy the opportunity to connect with these creatures and care for them amidst a postcard-like backdrop. You will conclude your adventurous day with a night safari at Chiang Mai’s leading wildlife attraction. On board an open-sided tram, you will experience up-close encounters with majestic mammals and beautiful birds. This will bring your stay in Chiang Mai to a dazzling close.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Rai – Discover Native Living in the North
dayInfo.description: A short distance from Chiang Mai lies the charming city of Chiang Rai. It is a charming destination that retains a traditional atmosphere in every regard. Rolling fields and striking mountains are the highlights of this marvelously untamed environment which hugs the city limits. You will witness these surreal sights from your private boutique suite in a revered resort that will be complete with top-tier amenities. You can settle into your traditionally-inspired room and acclimatize to the area within the luxury of your accommodation. Thereafter, you will venture to impressive cultural landmarks that are sprawled across the landscape. Here, you will discover the meticulous design of Wat Rong Khun , which is a temple that was entirely constructed in white, before uncovering the historical significance of this ancient piece of spiritual architecture. The following morning, you will delight in sweeping vistas of Chiang Rai as you soar across the sky in a hot air balloon at dawn. Secluded and far from any crowds, you will share the surreal sights of Northern Thailand’s wonderfully underdeveloped topography. Northern Thailand’s rural simplicity is impressively represented at an ethnic hill tribes’ village. Later this day, you will transfer to one of these villages and will be accompanied by your knowledgeable tour guide. You will be welcomed by friendly locals and share in their traditions throughout. A delightful authentic lunch will be prepared for you as you are entertained by flamboyant dance performances. The journey will share a tastefully true look into the traditional lifestyles that are still so prominent in the surrounding villages of Thailand. Before you depart for the bustling city of Bangkok, you will cruise the Mekong River by long-tailed boat for an impressive scenic display. Your fluent tour guide will shed light on the history of the Golden Triangle as you glide across the Delta. You can capture splendid moments amidst the gorgeous river backdrop as the Thai sun reflects off of the calm water and illuminates the jungle-lined banks.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Explore the Heart of Thailand
dayInfo.description: The streets of Bangkok burst with energy, and there is an aura of authenticity that resonates from the colorful markets and grand temples that are dotted across its alluring expanse. You will arrive to the sounds of Tuk-Tuks , which are traditional, open-air, Southeast Asian vehicles that zip through the traffic as the smells of delicious Pad Thai , which is a mouthwatering noodle dish, fill the air. As you make your way to your distinguished, 5-star resort, you will witness the golden temples as they glimmer in the sunshine and the skyscrapers as they rise to staggering heights. Sheer luxury awaits you on this enchanting expedition within this sought-after stop in Thailand. Your journey will take you to the steps of Wat Arun , which is an immaculately designed temple that is decorated in multi-colored porcelain and guarded by intricate statues. You will continue and be accompanied by a knowledgeable tour guide to the temple of the Reclining Buddha, where you will encounter a momentous golden Buddha image in all its glistening glory. You can peruse the sacred complex and capture moments alongside the luminescent monuments before walking the thriving streets of Bangkok, where you will be guided by the tantalizing scents of delicious and traditional cuisine. You can find yourselves meandering through the vibrant stalls of an authentic market and feeling the enriching energy that radiates from these popular destinations. Your immersive exploration of Bangkok’s cultural landmarks will culminate with a regal cruise along the Chao Phraya River on board an elegant cruise liner. You will delight in an incredible, multiple-course meal as you witness the sunset fade beyond the peaks of the tallest skyscrapers. The following day, you will set off in search of the country’s riveting history at the ancient city of Ayutthaya. Embark within the comfort of a luxury coach and watch the world go by as you journey to the age-old highlight. Here, you will visit the Historical Park and uncover fascinating insight into the area’s past. A knowledgeable guide will ensure that you visit the most significant temple ruins and relics, and your tour will reveal the whimsical, natural paradise setting and the sites of grand importance that serve as iconic testaments to Thailand’s dramatic heritage. You will further delve into Thailand’s heritage on your final day in Bangkok when a captivating, guided tour will share enchanting encounters with the city’s diverse art scene and architectural displays. One pivotal stop on this tour is the famous Jim Thompson House, which is where you will learn the remarkable story of the reintroduction of Thai silk into the world’s leading fashion establishments.

dayInfo.title: Kanchanaburi – Peaceful Serenity on the River Kwai
dayInfo.description: Kanchanaburi lies beyond the outskirts of Bangkok, but it will not be a long journey. You will transfer to this secluded location within the comfort of a private coach. This part of your trip will leave the bustle of the city behind, and you will soon find yourselves surrounded by flawless natural scenes. You will share in serene vistas of the vast, emerald rice paddies that stretch off into the distance and the rugged mountains that rise into the clouds. The short drive will fill you with a sense of wonderment amidst the tranquil backdrops. You will spend your nights in Kanchanaburi at a premier resort on the River Kwai . Your intimate suite sits on top of the river’s water, which will prove an incredibly unique and romantic setting to rest your heads. The view from your balcony will leave nothing to be desired, and from it, you can capture uninterrupted images amid the unspoiled wildlife. The following day will lead you along the banks of the River Kwai toward a traditional Mon village in the rural, jungle landscape. Here, you will spend your day, growing accustomed to the enchanting, cultural traditions of a local ethnic hill tribe while witnessing authentic performances from the talented natives. Much like your previous encounter with traditional living, your tour guide will ensure that you are able to seamlessly connect with the locals. The experience will leave you feeling great admiration and respect for their humble way of life. Before the sun sets over the sprawling landscape, you will revel in a fine dining experience at an exquisite restaurant in the area. The complete romance awaits as you tuck into gourmet meals with panoramic views and witness the stars as they twinkle in the sky. Before you set off for Thailand’s renowned islands, you will venture to Kanchanaburi’s essential museum for an immersive exploration of the location’s dramatic history. You will learn a wealth of information about the significance of this destination and the role that it served in World War II.

dayInfo.title: Koh Samui – A Piece of Secluded Paradise
dayInfo.description: Koh Samui is a beloved island paradise off the shores of mainland Thailand and a must-visit destination on this luxurious tour of the country. You will transfer to Koh Samui for a few nights of relaxation on the sunny, white-sand shores. An exquisite, 5-star resort awaits your arrival and boasts its own private beach for ultimate leisure when you reach the beach. A luxurious speedboat trip to the island will showcase the cataloged coastline in all its unfiltered majesty. You will feel the vitalizing breeze against your face as you zip across the azure sea. Soon, you will revel in the secluded beauty of your first-class resort and fine dine under the stars at a distinguished restaurant. The following day will further highlight the immense natural beauty of this water-hugged island. You will transfer via a luxury speedboat to Koh Samui’s coveted coastlines in search of hideaway beaches that are located far from the beaten path. Your insightful tour guide will share beach secrets and take you to illuminated coral reefs that circle the soft shores. You can hop off the boat with your snorkel gear and swim among the vibrant sea life as you capture remarkable moments that are worlds away from your everyday stress. As you approach midday, you will arrive on a gorgeous, secret beach and delight in a gourmet lunch at a private table on the shoreline. You can soak up the Thai sun and dine on exquisite meals that are prepared by a professional chef. To round off the day in elegant fashion, you will indulge in a spa treatment that is fit for royalty. You will be able to feel every ounce of stress fade from your body, and the aromas will enliven your spirit as an expert masseuse performs traditional Thai massage techniques. You will spend your final day in Koh Samui, taking full advantage of the tropical paradise. You will tuck into elegant meals that are prepared at some of the country’s most beloved seaside restaurants and relax on world-class beaches with crystal-clear waters. You will completely unwind as you revel in the luxurious splendor amidst picturesque, palm tree-lined scenes.

dayInfo.title: Phuket – Witness the Islands like Never Before
dayInfo.description: The final stop of your tour is Phuket, which is Thailand’s largest island that is home to a collection of pristine, white-sand beaches and captivating, cultural landmarks. Here, you will spend your evenings in the comfort of an impressive, 5-star resort that overlooks the stretching sands of Surin Beach. The remarkable resort boasts lavish suites, an incredible fine dining restaurant, and top-tier amenities to keep you thoroughly enthused throughout your stay. The shores of Surin Beach lead into the crystal-clear sea, and you will enjoy this surreal tropical setting shortly after you have arrived. In the evening, you will indulge in succulent Thai cuisine at the premier restaurant and marvel at the sunset vistas from your candlelit table. You will be swept away to the shores of Phuket’s stunning seaside settings the following day as you transfer to coveted beaches along its coastline, where you will be able to find a shady spot to rest under the palm trees. The coastal paradise exudes a sense of secluded leisure as you find yourselves on hideaway beaches that are less frequented than most of Thailand’s beaches. Your speedboat experience will ensure that no time is wasted exploring the best beach destinations along the sprawling coast. In the afternoon, you will take to the skies and witness Phuket from a completely unique perspective. Within a private helicopter, you will hover over the island and encounter impressive sights of its significant landmarks. You will sweep past the Big Buddha and up to Phang Nga Bay, where you will capture images of the sprawling, emerald sea. The luxurious journey across Phuket and its surroundings is an experience that is unlike any other and one that you will cherish for years to come. You will culminate your expedition with a champagne toast and sumptuous multiple-course meal. You can uncover the magic behind Thailand’s famous cuisine the following day at a prestigious culinary school. With professional chefs to guide you along the way, you will learn more about the country’s food culture and immerse yourselves into its distinct flavors. Thereafter, you will further delve into Phuket’s cultural origins as you transfer to sought-after sites around the island, where you can witness sweeping vistas of the entire island from the heights of the great Big Buddha Statue and capture the ornate golden temples as they shine under the luminous rays of the sun. Finally, you will visit an authentic, local market and discover the vibrant tastes of traditionally-prepared meals amid the colorful and enthusiastic stalls. You will transfer to the Similan Islands to conclude your stay in Southern Thailand. A short speedboat trip will reveal the impressive archipelago, and you will spend the day at its leading hideaway beaches. You can spend your final moments in Phuket, enjoying the seaside beauty of these spotless destinations. As you swim in the turquoise waters, you will encounter colorful creatures and feel the warmth of a vacation that has been well-spent flow through you. You will then transfer to the airport the following day, and after a delightful breakfast spread, you will fly home with many stories of your marvelous adventures in Thailand.
